A matchbox can be used as a miniature planter for small herbs or flowers.
A matchbox can be used as a miniature art kit, with paints, brushes, and other supplies stored inside.
A matchbox can be used as a miniature toolbox, with small tools like pliers, screwdrivers, and wrench stored inside.
A matchbox can be used as a miniature first aid kit, with supplies like band-aids, antiseptic, and pain relievers stored inside.
A matchbox can be used as a miniature sewing kit, with supplies like needles, thread, and scissors stored inside.
